segments.text: I see the details in this line drawing so clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains tied back on the window let in that garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, chaos brews with the sink overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying her plate with such care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet her foot's in the water, no reaction at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch her miss it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool catches my eye next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies while balancing on that tilt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any second, he could crash down with the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's cooperation makes it a team effort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secretive cookie heist adds a touch of whimsy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks make me uneasy overall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy outside contrasts the potential mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
